roleset.name: adjectival-only usage: never been developed
roleset.note: UNDEVELOP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from undevelop.01-v)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Build a new roadway on undeveloped land ? Ai n't gon na happen , with the power environmental groups and their lobby has in Sacramento .

example.name: Reducted relative
example.text: It went on to target for compulsory acquisition the land undeveloped *?* by farmers and lying fallow such as for example where a farmer had a couple thousand hectares of land and was only actively farming half of that land.

roleset.name: remove previously existing development
roleset.note: UNDEVELOP-V NOTES: Added by Julia. Strong correlation to VNcls destroy-44, which the previous sense does not hold. (from undevelop.02-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: Usually, people must continue with programs over the course of months or years so that they undeveloped the habits that have been created ...
example.arg: the habits that have been created
